name: Choco-ken no Chokotto Fushigi na Monogatari: Chocolate Hime to Mahou no Recipe
storyline: "Princess Chocolat", the princess of the Chocolatier Kingdom, which was invaded by the Vegetal Kingdom, summons heroes with summoning magic to gather ingredients for magic recipes. However, what appeared in front of Princess Chocolat was the chocolate dog Strawberry and her companions, who could hardly be thought of as a brave hero...
summary: Choko Inu no Chokotto Fushigi na Monogatari: Chocolate Hime to Mahou no Recipe is a game for the Nintendo 3DS by Nippon Columbia.
